foreignData.name: Utensil der Wildheit
foreignData.text:
{G}, opfere das Utensil der Wildheit: Lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur zu einem Zeitpunkt, zu dem du auch eine Hexerei wirken könntest.
Wenn das Utensil der Wildheit aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.name: Ingenio de ferocidad
foreignData.text:

Cuando el Ingenio de ferocidad vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla, roba una carta.

foreignData.name: Outil de férocité
foreignData.text:

Quand l'Outil de férocité est mis dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, piochez une carte.

foreignData.name: Strumento di Ferocia
foreignData.text:

Quando lo Strumento di Ferocia viene messo in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia, pesca una carta.

foreignData.name: 獰猛器具
foreignData.text:
{G}, 獰猛器具を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。この能力は、あなたがソーサリーを唱えられるときにのみ起動できる。
獰猛器具が戦場から墓地に置かれたとき、カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.name: 광포화 장치
foreignData.text:
{G}, 광포화 장치를 희생한다: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다. 당신이 집중마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기에만 이 능력을 활성화할 수 있다.
광포화 장치가 전장에서 무덤에 놓일 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.name: Implemento de Ferocidade
foreignData.text:

Quando Implemento de Ferocidade for colocado em um cemitério vindo do campo de batalha, compre um card.

foreignData.name: Орудие Свирепости

Когда Орудие Свирепости попадает с поля битвы на кладбище, возьмите карту.

name: Implement of Ferocity
originalText:
{G}, Sacrifice Implement of Ferocity: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
When Implement of Ferocity is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

rulings.text: An Implement’s last ability triggers no matter why it’s put into a graveyard from the battlefield. You don’t have to activate its first ability.

If you activate an Implement’s first ability, you’ll draw a card from its second ability before the first ability resolves. If the first ability has a target, you need a legal target to activate that ability, and you choose that target before seeing what card you’ll draw.

text:
{G}, Sacrifice Implement of Ferocity: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Implement of Ferocity is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
